channel.name: CSPAN 2 US
channel.title: Jason Bohm, Washington's Marines
channel.desc: Author and U.S. Marine Corps Maj. Gen. Jason Bohm talks about the origins of the Marine Corps, including strategic decisions that shaped the formation of the Continental Marines in the Revolutionary War.
